item.title: Soldering
item.description: Soldering Soldering is the process of connecting a component to a PCB by melting solder between the surfaces. Traditionally, soldering is done using a soldering iron - essentially a very hot stick of metal that you gently touch to heat the circuit board, solder, and component together.

item.title: Ergonomic Keyboards
item.description: Ergonomic Keyboards An ergonomic keyboard is a tool for inputting symbols to a computer in a way that doesn’t compromise on the user’s comfort. Typical features that might make a keyboard more ergonomic that the traditional counterpart are a split design, ortholinear or columnar staggered keys, or non-traditional angles.

item.title: Obsidian Notes
item.description: Obsidian Notes What is Obsidian? In late 2022, I was lucky enough to stumble onto a wonderful project called Obsidian Notes. The principle is simple: a note-taking software composed of plain markdown files with a focus on interconnection and extensibility.

item.title: Tantalus
item.description: Tantalus Introduction This is my 3rd ergonomic keyboard, and my first completely custom design. My previous build, the Dactyl Manuform R-Track, was almost perfect.

item.title: Icarus
item.description: Icarus Introduction I had just finished a written math assignment when I thought to myself: why should I have to compute something on my calculator, then enter it into the computer? ...

item.title: Dactyl Manuform R-Track
item.description: Dactyl Manuform R-Track Preface: This design is entirely made by QQurn, and details can be found at gitlab.com/keyboards1/dm_r_track. After building my first ergonomic keyboard a few months prior, I wanted to do more electronics.

item.title: KiCad
item.description: KiCad KiCad is an open-source suite for designing Printed Circuit Boards.

item.title: Printed Circuit Boards
item.description: Printed Circuit Boards A printed circuit board, or PCB, is a object that allows us to physically wire together, or route, the components of a Circuit.

item.title: Algebra
item.description: Algebra Algebra is the branch of mathematics that studies structure and manipulation. We are introduced to elementary algebra in middle or high school, but the field is much deeper and more beautiful.

item.title: Proper Subsets
item.description: Proper Subsets Topic: Algebra A Set A is a proper subset of a set B if A \subseteq B but A \neq B. In this case, we can omit the line: A \subset B. This is alternately written as A \subsetneq B.
